title: WBPSC Notification 2026 - Apply Online for Librarian Posts
description: The West Bengal Public Service Commission (WBPSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Librarian Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma or Post-graduation can apply for the WBPSC Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, appl...
